text: According to Newton's first law of motion, an object continues in its state of rest or of uniform motion unless acted upon by a...
State Newton's second law of motion.
answer:
Newton's Second Law:
The rate of change of linear momentum of a body is directly proportional to the applied external force and takes place in the direction of the force. Mathematically, $\vec{F} = \frac{d\vec{p}}{dt} = m\vec{a}$.
